titleStmt.title: Englands sin, and shame: in a paralel between the degenerate estate of old Rome & Great Britain. Or, Hor. Lib. 3. Ode 6. Ad romanos de moribus sui fæculi corruptis. Occasionally paraphrased, and applyed for the 30th. of January 1672. Being the anniversary of the murder of that blessed martyr King Charles I.

notesStmt.note: "Horat. Lib. 3. Ode VI." is in Latin at the end of the English text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
